attributes.action: allow citizens to contribute to a charity fund to raise the ransom to free Paul and Rachel Chandler.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Your government won't pay the ransom - I understand you'd endanger more people by setting a precedent, but this poor couple must be going through Hell. Allow people to donate a fiver, let's see how much we can raise and maybe get them home. If I had the technical expertise to set up a charity website enabled for donations myself I would do it, but alas, I do not, and I'm not a registered charity myself. Your government should create this website.

rejection.details: We cannot accept an e-petition relating to an individual case of this nature.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
